mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PY_PCR_CRS_CRT_IVI_ITM( UUID, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER, TRN_ID, DOCUMENT_NO, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, ORIGINAL_ADDRESS, VERIFY_OF_PARITY, VERIFY_OF_AREA, VERIFY_OF_BIRTHDAY, IS18_INDENTIFY, VERIFY_RESULT, APP_ID ) VALUES( sys_guid(), sysdate, #{crtUser}, #{trnId}, #{documentNo}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{originalAddress}, #{verifyOfParity}, #{verifyOfArea}, #{verifyOfBirthday}, #{is18Indentify}, #{verifyResult}, #{appId} )
